channel.title: My R Blog
channel.description: Recent content on My R Blog

item.title: Using R Markdown for recurring Reports
item.description: In this post I will show you some of my best practises for using R Markdown for reporting. We will cover how to insert inline code. how to create beautiful tables. how to insert figures use global variables Insert plots & figures You can easily insert the figures that are created with R code. Just write R code within your code chunls, that creates a plot.

item.title: R Markdown for Novices: All you need to to get started on your first R Markdown document
item.description: I write this blogpost for someone, who has never worked with R Markdown. After you read this post, you will understand why R Markdown may be useful for your daily work as a student, researcher, analyst or data scientist. understand the basic structure of an R Markdown document and how you can get startet. I strongly encourage everybody working with R to use R Markdown. I promise, it will make your life so much easier.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
